manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oribe Signature Conditioner Restorative daily moisturizer. Hydrating polymers revive youthful shine for lustrous, healthy locks and detangle for ease of combing throughout the day. Conditioner just got luxurious. How to Use: Massage, indulge (for at least one minute), rinse. Benefits: - Rich, high-performance- intense, but weightless. - Repairs and protects. - Formulated without parabens or sodium chloride. Color and keratin treatment safe. UV protection for hair.

Ingredients - Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress, photoaging and the deterioration of natural keratin, all while protecting from the drying, damaging and color-depleting effects of the elements. - Macadamia Nut Seed Oil, from the Australian rainforest, smoothes hair and delivers antioxidant properties. - Whole Wheat-Derived Proteins moisturize and condition. - Kaempferia Galanga Root Extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection. - Keratin and Hydrolyzed Keratin strengthen damaged hair and protect the surface of the hair shaft. Together, they penetrate the cortex to provide antiaging benefits, maintain hair strength and prevent UV degradation. - Formulated without parabens or sodium chloride. Color and keratin treatment safe. UV protection for hair.

Signature Conditioner Conditioner for Moisture & Control Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner Hair Type Everyone, everyday. For those who want to tame their tresses. For anyone, especially those with hair that has been damaged by time, styling or processing. Benefits High-performance conditioner Intense, but weightless Repairs and protects. Tames coarse, curly and kinky hair. Deep-hydrating conditioner. Fights frizz to leave hair silky and shiny. Moisturizes and restores. Smoothes each cuticle for ultra-soft hair. Reverses damage by sealing in moisture to strengthen hair. When Every morning you need a little indulgence. To add heathy hydration and soften coarse locks with maximum shine. To soften and revitalize hair, undoing the damage of time and style. Why Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts), Macadamia Nut Seed Oil, Whole Wheat-Derived Proteins,Kaempferia Galanga Root Extract, Keratin and Hydrolyzed Keratin. Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts), Keratin and Hydrolyzed Keratin, Amber Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride, Plant-Derived Protein Complex, Apigenin, Oleanolic Acid & Biotinoyl Tripeptide-1 Complex. Oribe Signature Complex (Watermelon, Lychee and Edelweiss Flower Extracts), Mediterranean Cypress Extract, Argan Oil, Maracuja Oil, Bio-Restorative Complex, and Bromelain.

Complete the Look Signature Shampoo Treatment grade. Silkens and detangles. Repairs and protects. Signature Moisture Masque Super-rich, deep conditioning. Reparative treatment. Restores moisture and softness. Daily Ritual Cream Face Cleanser Our luminous cream cleanser gently rinses away makeup, dirt, oil and impurities without stripping essential moisture. Split End Seal For split end repair and protection against color fading.

About the Brand Oribe Hair Care was founded with the goal of creating a new kind of hair company, one that was designed with the most discriminating customers in mind. When developing the line, we didn't want to compromise on any detail. We leveraged skin care technology and natural actives to deliver high-performance, treatment-based products- all while never forgetting that healthy hair is the underpinning for sexy, glamorous styling. Each product has been created to ensure the highest results, leaving us with a collection that truly meets the needs of the hair-obsessed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good conditioner for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: This is a good conditioner if you have fine hair. It doesn’t weigh it down. It has a nice smell. It is expensive but I think it is worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful conditioner that makes hair so manageable you don't need other products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I bought this conditioner as an addition to the corresponding shampoo. I know that this is a lot of money to spend on a conditioner but I wanted to try this brand for a long time and finally took the plunge. I love it!!! It has a light perfume smell to it. No overwhelming but it stays with you all day. I think the scent even smells expensive!!! I have fine, thin, color treated short hair. My hair is flat. This conditioner seemed perfect for me. It is not heavy and you don't need to use very much. The directions said to leave it on for one minute before rinsing which I did. After blow drying, I feel it made my hair super shiny and soft. But I was still able to curl it with a curling iron and the curls held great. This is a perfect conditioner for me. Even though it's pricey I feel it's worth it. I will certainly buy this product again. With the little amount that you need the bottle should last quite a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oribe hair conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I just received my Oribe conditioner. After I used the conditioner I went to tighten the lid & it wouldn’t tighten. If the lid falls off for some reason the conditioner will leak out. I paid alot of money for this conditioner so be aware if you purchase this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Costly, but lovely
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo and conditioner set smells fabulous, conditioner works great, and gives hair great volume! Love it, but wish is were more affordable!!! Very expensive so I use travel size for special occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oribe Signature Conditioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best conditioner I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: This is expensive and wish it was cheaper but it's worth it to have my hair in the best condition it's ever been.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell of this conditioner.
I have thick hair which despite great care from me, loves to look hectic and frizzy.This conditioner is a game changer. Ultra moisturizing without creating an oil slick. A must have. Worth the price.

Yeah this really makes a difference. I have thin, somewhat damaged hair. Using this once a month or so, in the couple days following the conditioning i have sleek and shiny, hydrated hair. Super visible difference, unlike regular conditioners. Which explains the price lol. I wasn't able to subsitute it as a regular conditioner though, it eventually weighed down my thin hair. So i technically use it more as a mask than anything else.
